dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, [clears throat] Host_B, you know how we always talk about the importance of a good workplace?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, Host_B, you know how we always talk about the importance of a good workplace?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. It's, like, crucial for productivity, morale...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. It's, like, crucial for productivity, morale...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But it turns out, it's also, um, really good for business. Like, there's a mutual fund, Parnassus Endeavor, that invests in companies with high workplace ratings. And get this: they've actually beaten the market over the last ten years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But it turns out, it's also, um, really good for business. Like, there's a mutual fund, Parnassus Endeavor, that invests in companies with high workplace ratings. And get this: they've actually beaten the market over the last ten years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In fact, a mutual fund that invests in companies with positive workplace ratings, Parnassus Endeavor, has beaten the market handily over the past 10 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Wow. So it's not just, like, a feel-good thing. It's financially savvy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So it's not just, like, a feel-good thing. It's financially savvy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Proof positive. Which actually brings us to this really interesting list I saw.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Proof positive. Which actually brings us to this really interesting list I saw.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the CareerBliss one? The "happiest companies" list?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the CareerBliss one? The happiest companies list?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! That's the one. Uh, how do they even figure that out, anyway?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! That's the one. Uh, how do they even figure that out, anyway?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they survey, like, tens of thousands of workers, you know? And ask them to rate their employers on ten key factors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they survey, like, tens of thousands of workers, you know? And ask them to rate their employers on ten key factors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It surveyed tens of thousands of workers and asked them to rate their employers on ten key factors, such as their relationship with management, workplace environment, compensation, satisfaction with job function and growth opportunities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ten factors? Like what? Pay, obviously...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ten factors? Like what? Pay, obviously...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, compensation, but also things like their relationship with management, the workplace environment, even satisfaction with their actual job function and growth opportunities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, compensation, but also things like their relationship with management, the workplace environment, even satisfaction with their actual job function and growth opportunities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It surveyed tens of thousands of workers and asked them to rate their employers on ten key factors, such as their relationship with management, workplace environment, compensation, satisfaction with job function and growth opportunities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, like, the whole package. Who made it to the top? I'm always curious about this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, like, the whole package. Who made it to the top? I'm always curious about this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You know, the number one spot actually surprised me. It's Keller Williams Realty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, the number one spot actually surprised me. It's Keller Williams Realty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Keller Williams Realty takes the top spot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Really? A real estate company? That's, um, unexpected. What makes them so happy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really? A real estate company? That's, um, unexpected. What makes them so happy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, a huge benefit is they really promote from within. Employees feel encouraged to control their own growth and career paths.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, a huge benefit is they really promote from within. Employees feel encouraged to control their own growth and career paths.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Keller Williams Realty employee wrote on CareerBliss.com, One of the greatest benefits is how our company promotes from within. All employees are encouraged and supported to be in control of their growth and career paths.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's smart. What about, like, big-name brands? Any of those up there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's smart. What about, like, big-name brands? Any of those up there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. Nike came in second! They're navigating that big shift to selling direct to consumers, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. Nike came in second! They're navigating that big shift to selling direct to consumers, you know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sneaker king Nike ranks second. It remains one of the most valuable brands in the world, and its navigating a big transition as more consumers shop online. In June it announced its NIKE Direct initiativethe company is trying to sell more of its products directly to consumers through its website and own stores, rather than rely on traditional retailers like Foot Locker.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I've noticed that. Trying to cut out the middleman, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I've noticed that. Trying to cut out the middleman, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And then, uh, Adobe is number four. You know, Photoshop, PDFs...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And then, uh, Adobe is number four. You know, Photoshop, P D Fs...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adobe is the fourth happiest company, according to CareerBliss.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Ah, Adobe! I've always heard good things about their culture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, Adobe! I've always heard good things about their culture.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Super collaborative, really energizing. An employee even said people are always friendly and professional.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super collaborative, really energizing. An employee even said people are always friendly and professional.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The atmosphere is highly collaborative and energizing. People have always been friendly and helpful; very professional, wrote one employee on CareerBliss.com.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds ideal. And what about, like, healthcare?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds ideal. And what about, like, healthcare?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Amgen, the pharmaceutical giant, made it to fifth. Great work-life balance, they even have fantastic daycare on campus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Amgen, the pharmaceutical giant, made it to fifth. Great work-life balance, they even have fantastic daycare on campus.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pharmaceutical giant Amgen ranks fifth. ... The work-life balance is great, fantastic daycare on campus, lots of smart co-workers, wrote one CareerBliss reviewer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, daycare on campus? That's a huge perk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, daycare on campus? That's a huge perk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Plus, workers there really feel the positive impact they make on patients' lives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Plus, workers there really feel the positive impact they make on patients' lives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Working for Amgen was very rewarding to see the positive impact we made in patients lives, reported a West Coast employee.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, it really does seem to boil down to more than just, um, a good salary. It's about culture, growth, and feeling valued.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, it really does seem to boil down to more than just, um, a good salary. It's about culture, growth, and feeling valued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. When companies invest in their people like that, it just pays off in spades.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. When companies invest in their people like that, it just pays off in spades.
